thread.title: The far-right campaign to influence Italy's election

title: The far-right campaign to influence Italy's election
text:
The far-right campaign to influence Italy's election 1:57pm EST - 02:27 
Far-right activists are collaborating online to influence Italy's election, according to researchers at a counter extremism NGO who have gone undercover in private chats on encrypted apps.   
Far-right activists are collaborating online to influence Italy's election, according to researchers at a counter extremism NGO who have gone undercover in private chats on encrypted apps.  //reut.rs/2ESSkNb
